医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球分析凸显抗生素消费趋势和抗菌素耐药性威胁一项新的研究强调了全球人类抗生素消费量近期但波动的增长，这是抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 不断增长的主要驱动因素之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Global-analysis-highlights-antibiotic-conspiration-trends-and-AMR-threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Global-analysis-highlights-antibiotic-conspiration-trends-and-AMR-threat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f0b2eaa-fd32-484f-a8a1-73e3242f7059 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 11:20:01 -0500 Global analysis highlights antibiotic consumption trends and AMR threat
研究揭示吸入屋尘螨如何引发过敏性哮喘匹兹堡大学的新研究揭示了吸入的屋尘螨（过敏性哮喘的常见诱因）如何激活免疫系统并导致小鼠患上这种疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Research-uncovers-how-inhaled-house-dust-mites-trigger-of-allergic-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Research-uncovers-how-inhaled-house-dust-mites-trigger-of-allergic-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4dd0960-e8b3-4887-a3c0-d749f6090c34 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 10:55:02 -0500 Research uncovers how inhaled house dust mites trigger of allergic asthma
研究揭示了预测心脏病的多基因风险评分的变异性多基因风险评分 (PRS) 是遗传学中的一种尖端工具，它结合了整个基因组中遗传标记的信息来估计一个人患某些疾病的风险，例如冠状动脉疾病 (CAD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-reveals-variability-in-polygenic-risk-scores-for-predicting-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-reveals-variability-in-polygenic-risk-scores-for-predicting-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2364250-90fe-4a99-a7b4-6d70fb740f3c Tue, 19 Nov 2024 10:42:09 -0500 Study reveals variability in polygenic risk scores for predicting heart disease
新型 CAR T 细胞疗法有望对抗侵袭性 HER2+ 乳腺癌三分之一的 HER2 阳性 (HER2+) 肿瘤表达 P95HER2 蛋白，该蛋白与预后较差的侵袭性乳腺癌有关。希伯伦谷肿瘤研究所 (VHIO) 生长因子小组的研究人员与巴塞罗那德尔马医院研究所 (HMRI) 癌症研究项目的研究人员合作，开发了新型嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) T 细胞可以对表达 p95HER2 的细胞产生有效的抗肿瘤反应的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-CAR-T-cell-therapy-shows-promise-against-aggressive-HER22b-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-CAR-T-cell-therapy-shows-promise-against-aggressive-HER22b-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3210d016-eaeb-4b61-b1d7-da675e46322c Tue, 19 Nov 2024 10:39:06 -0500 New CAR T-cell therapy shows promise against aggressive HER2+ breast cancer
10x Genomics 和 Beckman Coulter Life Sciences 推出新的解决方案来自动化单细胞检测工作流程10x Genomics 和 Beckman Coulter Life Sciences 宣布推出一种新的解决方案，用于自动化单细胞基因表达工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/10x-Genomics-and-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-Launch-New-Solution-to-Automate-Single-Cell-Assay-Workflows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/10x-Genomics-and-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-Launch-New-Solution-to-Automate-Single-Cell-Assay-Workflows.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5302e47-3fd4-40ef-af84-083a6d642cfa Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:54:00 -0500 10x Genomics and Beckman Coulter Life Sciences Launch New Solution to Automate Single Cell Assay Workflows
研究深入了解中低收入国家新生儿传染病的趋势和差异北京大学研究人员对1990年至2019年低收入和中等收入国家15种常见新生儿传染病的流行状况、长期趋势和危险因素进行了深入研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-provides-insights-into-trends-and-disparities-of-neonatal-infectious-diseases-in-LMICs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-provides-insights-into-trends-and-disparities-of-neonatal-infectious-diseases-in-LMICs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a583eff-f3d1-4a26-8a62-a78c884cf6db Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:25:09 -0500 Study provides insights into trends and disparities of neonatal infectious diseases in LMICs
研究发现冠状动脉钙评分可以预测男性和女性心脏病发作和死亡的风险冠状动脉钙（CAC）评分已成为医生轻松确定患者冠状动脉内斑块数量的一种无创方法，但问题是该评分在识别女性和男性方面的准确性如何。心脏病发作或死亡的高风险人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Coronary-artery-calcium-scores-found-to-predict-risk-of-heart-attack-and-death-in-both-men-and-妇女.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Coronary-artery-calcium-scores-found-to-predict-risk-of-heart-attack-and-death-in-both-men-and- Women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f4e03eb-df9d-4051-a42a-37dab5b4e4cb Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:19:48 -0500 Coronary artery calcium scores found to predict risk of heart attack and death in both men and women
疟疾晶体结构为更有效的药物提供线索莱斯利·莱瑟罗维茨 (Leslie Leiserowitz) 教授第一次对疟疾产生兴趣是在南非，当时他还是个小男孩。他的父亲为了家族生意在非洲大陆寻找木材，带回的不仅是大象和大猩猩的故事，还有皮疹和耳鸣，这是他服用奎宁预防疟疾的副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Malaria-crystal-struct-offers-clues-for-more- effective-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Malaria-crystal-struct-offers-clues-for-more- effective-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d89368e1-8aba-46a8-870c-214c7b69e51b Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:17:13 -0500 Malaria crystal structure offers clues for more effective medications
肽水凝胶提高抗生素对抗耐药细菌的有效性瑞典查尔姆斯理工大学的研究表明，当治疗与配备抗菌肽的材料相结合时，耐药细菌可以重新对抗生素敏感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Peptide-hydrogel-boosts-antibiotic-effectness-against-resistive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Peptide-hydrogel-boosts-antibiotic-effectness-against-resistive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=021ea54d-6a4f-4e2e-bdf4-2991188c0b83 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:10:42 -0500 Peptide hydrogel boosts antibiotic effectiveness against resistant bacteria
使用 Bio-Rad 的新型 ddPCR 试剂盒进行高精度 AAV 衣壳测量，从粗裂解物到纯度使用 Bio-Rad 的新型 ddPCR 试剂盒直接从粗裂解液中准确定量 AAV 衣壳，提供可靠、高效和精确的测量，以简化您的研究工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/From-crude-lysate-to-purity-with-high- precision-AAV-capsid-measurement-with-Bio-Rads-new-ddPCR-Kit。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/From-crude-lysate-to-purity-with-high- precision-AAV-capsid-measurement-with-Bio-Rads-new-ddPCR-Kit。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3721bfaf-2bb0-41d6-ae87-c2d5487cd1f9 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:05:00 -0500 From crude lysate to purity with high-precision AAV capsid measurement with Bio-Rad's new ddPCR Kit
